Methods

| Edit this page View Source

AutoAssignBotRole()

Displays the list of roles eligible for auto-assigning to bots when they join the guild.

Declaration
[Cmd("AutoAssignBotRole")]
[Aliases("AutoAssignBotRole")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageRoles)]
public Task AutoAssignBotRole()
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This command requires the caller to have GuildPermission.ManageRoles.

Examples

.autoassignbotrole

| Edit this page View Source

AutoAssignBotRole(IRole)

Enables or disables auto-assigning the specified role to bots when they join the guild.

Declaration
[Cmd("AutoAssignBotRole")]
[Aliases("AutoAssignBotRole")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageRoles)]
public Task AutoAssignBotRole(IRole role)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IRole role

The role to enable or disable auto-assigning
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This command requires the caller to have GuildPermission.ManageRoles.

Examples

.autoassignbotrole RoleName
